text:
replaced by the number of ﬁlter maps and kernel size in the convolutional layers. The chosen
set of hyperparameters to grid search in the CNN model are as follows:
 n input: The number of prior inputs to use as input for the model (e.g. 12 months).
 n filters: The number of ﬁlter maps in the convolutional layer (e.g. 32).
 n kernel: The kernel size in the convolutional layer (e.g. 3).
 n epochs: The number of training epochs (e.g. 1000).
